column1: * The City Attorney is appointed by City Council to serve as legal advisor to the City Council, the City Manager, and
all Departments and Boards and Commissions of the City.
* Prepares and reviews ordinances for introduction to Council.
* Drafts and reviews all contracts, licenses, permits, deeds, leases, and other legal documents to which the City is
* Represents the City in all legal proceedings and prosecutes violations of City ordinances.
* This department also funds collection of delinquent real estate and personal property taxes.
* No change in total budget from FY 2013 to FY 2014.
